TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XNamespace extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Represents an XML namespace.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表命名空間的 XML 的建構。This class represents the XML construct of namespaces. 每隔包含。Every contains an . 即使項目不在命名空間中，項目的 仍然會包含命名空間 。Even if an element is not in a namespace, the element's still contains a namespace, . 不保證 屬性為 `null`。The property is guaranteed to not be `null`. ## 建立 XNamespace 物件Creating an XNamespace Object 若要建立的最常見方式物件是只需將字串指派給它。The most common way to create an object is to simply assign a string to it. 您接著可以使用加法運算子的覆寫，與區域名稱結合命名空間。You can then combine the namespace with a local name by using the override of the addition operator. 下列範例示範此慣用句：The following example shows this idiom: ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", "Content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", "Content") Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 不過，在 Visual Basic 中，您會通常宣告全域預設命名空間，如下所示：However, in Visual Basic, you would typically declare a global default namespace, as follows: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ Content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Content ``` 指派字串給會使用隱含方式轉換。Assigning a string to an uses the implicit conversion from . 請參閱[如何： 建立包含命名空間 (C#) (LINQ to XML) 文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c)如需詳細資訊和範例。See [How to: Create a Document with Namespaces (C#) (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/af4a595e-ffb2-4187-a61b-d5ed71642c4c) for more information and examples. 請參閱[在 Visual Basic (LINQ to XML) 中的命名空間](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc)如需有關使用 Visual Basic 中的命名空間。See [Namespaces in Visual Basic (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10b7ba7b-518c-4f14-899f-892575d14dcc) for more information on using namespaces in Visual Basic. ## 控制命名空間前置詞Controlling Namespace Prefixes 如果您建立宣告命名空間的屬性，屬性中指定的前置詞會保存在序列化的 XML 中。If you create an attribute that declares a namespace, the prefix specified in the attribute will be persisted in the serialized XML. 若要建立宣告具有特定前置詞之命名空間的屬性，您可以建立屬性，其中之屬性名稱的命名空間為 ，而屬性的名稱為命名空間前置詞。To create an attribute that declares a namespace with a prefix, you create an attribute where the namespace of the name of the attribute is , and the name of the attribute is the namespace prefix. 屬性的值為命名空間的 URI。The value of the attribute is the URI of the namespace. 下列範例示範此慣用句：The following example shows this idiom: ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), "Content"); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", _ New XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), _ "Content") Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中，而不是建立命名空間節點，來控制命名空間前置詞，您通常會使用全域命名空間宣告：In Visual Basic, instead of creating a namespace node to control namespace prefixes, you would typically use a global namespace declaration: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ Content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Content ``` 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 控制命名空間前置詞 (C#) (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a40d4479-f1b9-4d8b-8623-445648caed28)。For more information, see [How to: Control Namespace Prefixes (C#) (LINQ to XML)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a40d4479-f1b9-4d8b-8623-445648caed28). ## 建立預設的命名空間Creating a Default Namespace 建構時的屬性，將會為命名空間，如果屬性名稱有"xmlns"為特殊值，然後時序列化 XML 樹狀結構時，會將命名空間宣告為預設命名空間。When constructing an attribute that will be a namespace, if the attribute name has the special value of "xmlns", then when the XML tree is serialized, the namespace will be declared as the default namespace. 特殊的屬性"xmlns"本身的名稱不在任何命名空間中。The special attribute with the name of "xmlns" itself is not in any namespace. 屬性的值會是命名空間 URI。The value of the attribute is the namespace URI. 下列範例會建立 XML 樹狀結構，其中包含一種命名空間會變成預設的命名空間中宣告的屬性：The following example creates an XML tree that contains an attribute that is declared in such a way that the namespace will become the default namespace: ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute("xmlns", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", _ New XAttribute("xmlns", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), _ New XElement(aw + "Child", "content") _ ) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中，而不是建立命名空間節點，來建立預設的命名空間，您通常會使用全域預設命名空間宣告：In Visual Basic, instead of creating a namespace node to create a default namespace, you would typically use a global default namespace declaration: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content ``` ## XNamespace 不可部分完成XNamespace Atomization 系統保證 物件為不可部分完成的，也就是說，如果有兩個 物件擁有完全相同的 URI，將會共用相同的執行個體。 objects are guaranteed to be atomized; that is, if two objects have exactly the same URI, they will share the same instance. 針對此用途明確提供相等和比較運算子。The equality and comparison operators are provided explicitly for this purpose. ## 使用擴充的名稱Using Expanded Names 若要指定命名空間和本機名稱的另一個方法是使用表單中的擴充的名稱`{namespace}name`:Another way to specify a namespace and a local name is to use an expanded name in the form `{namespace}name`: ```csharp XElement e = new XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", new XAttribute("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Att", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(e); ``` ```vb Dim e As XElement = New XElement("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Root", _ New XAttribute("{http://www.adventure-works.com}Att", "content") _ ) Console.WriteLine(e) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` ``` 這個方法會有效能隱含作用。This approach has performance implications. 每次您將包含擴充名稱的字串傳遞到 [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] 時，此方法必須剖析名稱、尋找不可部分完成的命名空間，然後尋找不可部分完成的名稱。Each time that you pass a string that contains an expanded name to [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)], it must parse the name, find the atomized namespace, and find the atomized name. 這個程序會使用 CPU 時間。This process takes CPU time. 如果效能是重要的您可能想要使用不同的方式。If performance is important, you may want to use a different approach. 使用 Visual Basic 中，建議的方法是使用 XML 常值，這不需要使用的展開名稱。With Visual Basic, the recommended approach is to use XML literals, which does not involve the use of expanded names.

span.span: LINQ to XML

span.span: The to compare to the current .

summary.span: 判斷指定的 是否等於目前的 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified is equal to the current .

returns.span: ，指示指定的 是否與目前的 相等。

span.span: A that indicates whether the specified is equal to the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個物件設為等於，它們必須有相同的 URI。For two objects to be equal, they must have the same URI. ## Examples 下列範例會比較兩個參考相同的 URI 的命名空間。The following example compares two namespaces that refer to the same URI. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw == "http://www.adventure-works.com"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Console.WriteLine(GetXmlNamespace(aw) = "http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` True ```

param.name: namespaceName
param.span: 包含命名空間 URI 的 。

span.span: A that contains a namespace URI.

summary.span: 取得指定之統一資源識別元 (URI) 的 。

span.span: Gets an for the specified Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

returns.span: 從指定的 URI 建立的 。

span.span: An created from the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回保證物件是不可部分完成 （亦即，它是唯一在系統中針對該特定的 URI）。The returned object is guaranteed to be atomic (that is, it is the only one in the system for that particular URI). ## Examples 下列範例會取得從指定的 URI。The following example gets a from a specified URI. ```csharp XNamespace aw = XNamespace.Get("http://www.adventure-works.com"); // This is the preferred form. XNamespace aw2 = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw); Console.WriteLine(aw2); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = XNamespace.Get("http://www.adventure-works.com") ' This is the preferred form. Dim aw2 As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) Console.WriteLine(aw) Console.WriteLine(aw2) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com http://www.adventure-works.com ```

returns.span: ，它是透過這個 與指定的區域名稱建立的。

span.span: An created from this and the specified local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回保證物件是不可部分完成 （亦即，它是特定的擴充名稱的系統中唯一的）。The returned object is guaranteed to be atomic (that is, it is the only one in the system for a specific expanded name). ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性來擷取。The following example uses this property to retrieve an . ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XName name = aw.GetName("Root"); Console.WriteLine("{0}", name); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) Dim name As XName = aw.GetName("Root") Console.WriteLine("{0}", name) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` {http://www.adventure-works.com}Root ```

summary.span: 取得這個命名空間的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

span.span: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of this namespace.
A that contains the URI of the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性：The following example shows how to use this property: ```csharp string markup = @""; XElement root = XElement.Parse(markup); Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace.NamespaceName); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace(aw) Dim root As XElement = Console.WriteLine(root.Name.Namespace.NamespaceName) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com ```

.property class System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace None
Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As XNamespace
public: static property System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ None { System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ get(); };
member this.None : System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace

summary.span: 取得與無命名空間相對應的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that corresponds to no namespace.

value.span: 與無命名空間相對應的 。

span.span: The that corresponds to no namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目或屬性是在沒有命名空間，其命名空間將這個屬性所傳回的命名空間。If an element or attribute is in no namespace, its namespace will be set to the namespace returned by this property. ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個屬性，以決定哪些項目會在沒有命名空間中。The following example shows uses this property to determine which elements are in no namespace. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement(aw + "ChildInNamespace", "content"), new XElement("ChildInNoNamespace", "content") ); if (root.Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("Root element is in no namespace"); else Console.WriteLine("Root element is in a namespace"); if (root.Element(aw + "ChildInNamespace").Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in no namespace"); else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in a namespace"); if (root.Element("ChildInNoNamespace").Name.Namespace == XNamespace.None) Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in no namespace"); else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in a namespace"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ content content If (root.Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("Root element is in no namespace") Else Console.WriteLine("Root element is in a namespace") End If If (root.Element(GetXmlNamespace(aw) + "ChildInNamespace") _ .Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in no namespace") Else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNamespace element is in a namespace") End If If (root.Element("ChildInNoNamespace") _ .Name.Namespace Is XNamespace.None) Then Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in no namespace") Else Console.WriteLine("ChildInNoNamespace element is in a namespace") End If End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` Root element is in no namespace ChildInNamespace element is in a namespace ChildInNoNamespace element is in no namespace ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

summary.span: 將 物件與區域名稱結合在一起以建立 。

span.span: Combines an object with a local name to create an .

returns.span: 透過命名空間與區域名稱建構的 。

span.span: The new constructed from the namespace and local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此運算子可讓您結合命名空間與區域名稱建構的元素或屬性的慣用語。This operator enables the common idiom of combining a namespace and a local name in the construction of an element or attribute. 這個慣用語提供的命名空間前置詞，優點在於，您可以使用此變數會很短的命名空間參考。This idiom provides some of the benefits of having namespace prefixes, in that you can refer to a namespace using a variable that is short. 這樣就不會建立 XML 樹狀結構的程式碼的語法雜訊。This eliminates syntactic noise in the code that creates XML trees. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用`+`運算子來建立從和區域名稱。The following example shows the use of the `+` operator to create an from an and a local name. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XElement(aw + "Child") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim aw As XNamespace = "http://www.adventure-works.com" Dim root As XElement = New XElement(aw + "Root", _ New XElement(aw + "Child") _ ) Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中，這是慣用的慣用句：In Visual Basic, this is the preferred idiom: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Dim root As XElement = _ Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` ```

summary.span: 傳回數值，指出 的兩個執行個體是否相等。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether two instances of are equal.
A that indicates whether and are equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算子多載`==`並`!=`，以啟用之間的比較和字串 (例如`element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`)。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are provided to enable comparisons between and string (for example, `element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`). 在 C# 中預先定義的參考相等運算子需要一個可以轉換為透過參考轉換，其他類型的運算元，不考慮字串以隱含方式轉換。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only, and do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下列範例示範的比較和字串。The following example shows the comparison of an and a string. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw == "http://www.adventure-works.com"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Console.WriteLine(aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` True ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 運算子多載`==`並`!=`，以啟用之間的比較和字串 (例如`element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`)。The operator overloads `==` and `!=` are provided to enable comparisons between and string (for example, `element.Name.Namespace == "http://www.adventure-works.com"`). 在 C# 中預先定義的參考相等運算子需要一個可以轉換為透過參考轉換，其他類型的運算元，不考慮字串以隱含方式轉換。The predefined reference equality operators in C# require one operand to be convertible to the type of the other through reference conversions only, and do not consider the implicit conversion from string to . ## Examples 下列範例顯示比較為字串。The following example shows a comparison of a to a string. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine(aw != "http://www.adventure-works.com"); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Console.WriteLine(aw <> "http://www.adventure-works.com") End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` False ```

span.span: Returns the URI of this .
The URI of this .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會使用這個方法，在主控台上列印的命名空間。The following example uses this method to print a namespace on the console. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; Console.WriteLine("{0}", aw.ToString()); ``` ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim aw As XNamespace = GetXmlNamespace() Console.WriteLine("{0}", aw) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` http://www.adventure-works.com ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace Xml { get; }
.property class System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace Xml
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Xml As XNamespace
public: static property System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ Xml { System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ get(); };
member this.Xml : System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace

summary.span: 取得與 XML URI (http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace) 相對應的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that corresponds to the XML URI (http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace).
The that corresponds to the XML URI (http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些標準化屬性，例如`space`，位於`http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace`命名空間。Certain standardized attributes, such as `space`, are in the `http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace` namespace. W3C 標準會指定此命名空間不需要宣告為 XML 樹狀結構中的屬性。The W3C standard specifies that this namespace does not have to be declared as an attribute in the XML tree. 它是保留的命名空間，一律會自動出現在 XML 剖析器。It is a reserved namespace that is always automatically available in the XML parser. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立`xml:space="preserve"`XML 樹狀結構中的屬性：The following example shows how to create an `xml:space="preserve"` attribute in an XML tree: ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xml + "space", "preserve"), new XElement("Child", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content ```

span.span: LINQ to XML

.property class System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace Xmlns
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Xmlns As XNamespace
public: static property System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ Xmlns { System::Xml::Linq::XNamespace ^ get(); };
member this.Xmlns : System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace

summary.span: 取得與 xmlns URI (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/) \(英文\) 相對應的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that corresponds to the xmlns URI (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/).
The that corresponds to the **xmlns** URI (http://www.w3.org/2000/xmlns/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您宣告命名空間時，命名空間屬性本身均**xmlns**命名空間。When you declare namespaces, the namespace attributes themselves are in the **xmlns** namespace. W3C 標準會指定此命名空間不需要宣告為 XML 樹狀結構中的屬性。The W3C standard specifies that this namespace does not have to be declared as an attribute in the XML tree. 它是保留的命名空間，一律會自動出現在 XML 剖析器。It is a reserved namespace that is always automatically available in the XML parser. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何將 XML 樹狀結構中的命名空間。The following example shows how to add a namespace to an XML tree. 屬性宣告的命名空間的命名空間是由這個屬性傳回的命名空間。The namespace for the attribute that declares the namespace is the namespace returned by this property. ```csharp XNamespace aw = "http://www.adventure-works.com"; XElement root = new XElement(aw + "Root", new XAttribute(XNamespace.Xmlns + "aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"), new XElement(aw + "Child", "content") ); Console.WriteLine(root); ``` ```vb Dim root = content Console.WriteLine(root) ``` 在 Visual Basic 中是慣用的慣用句：In Visual Basic, the preferred idiom is: ```vb Imports Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim root As XElement = _ content Console.WriteLine(root) End Sub End Module ``` 這個範例會產生下列輸出：This example produces the following output: ``` content ```

span.span: LINQ to XML
